text: Amalgamated Transit #Union Local 279 held a #rally in front of #Nepean MPP Lisa Mcleod's office on Monday to demand that transit workers be given priority access to the #COVID-19 #vaccine. @OttawaCitizen @ottawasuncom @MacLeodLisa #octranspo #COVID19 #COVID19Ontario #ottnews https://t.co/XMLZffoyd0
